idea:
YoUniverse Business Capital is committed to providing the finest Advising on Legal, Financial and Operational Aspects of Financing and Funding in Business.
Two-way connections are more secure as we will be ensuring the procedural and technical aspects of the Equity and Debt fundraising with the objective of Ensuring the Good Corporate Governance practice by the Entrepreneurs.
First Part,
For Startups and the Company seeking to raise the fund…
Converting the entire story of the start-ups into business plans & proposals
In-depth market study at a Macro level
Compulsorily registration with the Statutory Authority
Advising on the procedural and legal aspects of fundraising
For small and midsize Existing Body Corporate…
Advising on the best financial products or resources available in the financial market
Study on particular product and services and Industrial Research
Assisting them to connect with potential investors or fund provider
Maintaining stepwise Legal Compliances for smooth utilization of fund
name: YOUNIVERSE BUSINESS CAPITAL (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We have pleasure to introduce ourselves as a First ISO Certify Company in Mumbai  leading Printers, D.T.P., Designers. We undertakes all types of printing works at a very competative rates. We assure you of quality and prompt service, We are specialised in Visiting cards, Letter heads, Brochures, Folders, Files, Pamplets, Stickers, Lable, CD Inlays, Invitation cards, Wedding cards, Handbill, Invoice, Challans, Computer Stationery, etc.,
name: Frontline Enterprises

idea:
We have started the Genius Bridge as Language Consultant and providing training for English, Foreign Languages and communication solutions. This is the basic requirement of any organization. Being effective communicator, employee can help the organization to work smoothly and generate more revenue.


Apart from this, with 'Make in India', many multinational companies are establishing in India who requires the skilled people with command on their language for smooth functioning and co-ordination with the other units for progress.


Though graduates or engineers, our young generation is not getting opportunity to work with international organizations just because of language barrier.  Genius Bridge is working on bridging this gap and provide the opportunities to candidate by adding important skills like foreign Language & Communication.


We are planning to grow our setup to reach maximum students to enable them to work on Global platform.
name: Genius Bridge

idea:
OptimizeQ is a quality automation company which specialises in RPA based quality testing and assurance process. Our mission is to help our customers leapfrog to 6th generation of testing strategy using AI and ML technologies.
Our vision is to make automation a default choice in QA process by not only simplifying and aligning to agile development lifecycle, but also remove the hassles of complex enterprise automation products and expensive maintenance.

Visit our website at http://www.optimizeq.com
name: OPTIMIZEQ PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Wife is a Brand Management, Marketing, Communication and Creative agency specialising in all things Strategy, Design and Experiences and everything under it. We are in a polygamous relationship with our brands as their better halves and aim to engage with brands as their better half. We create strategically effective and disruptive plans and build outputs that more often than not go beyond the brief to result in a mutual vision. Our constant market research and sustained experience in the industry catalyses a brand’s equity building process through whatever medium they or we choose.
name: Wife
